20101224063003.000|20101224063006.000|CC1|with yellow stripes,            
20101224063006.000|20101224063006.000|CC1|or ya yellow                    
20101224063006.000|20101224063008.000|CC1|with black stripes?             
20101224063008.000|20101224063010.000|CC1| Yellow with black stripes, man.
20101224063010.000|20101224063010.000|CC1|Why don't you                   
20101224063010.000|20101224063014.000|CC1|just move along?                
20101224063014.000|20101224063014.000|CC1|       Let me ask you something.
20101224063014.000|20101224063016.000|CC1|              You sting my wife?
20101224063016.000|20101224063016.000|CC1|What kinda buzzin'              
20101224063016.000|20101224063017.000|CC1|question is that?

20101224063021.000|20101224063023.000|CC1|           (buzzing)
